name: Balancer
description: Balancer is a community-driven protocol, automated portfolio manager, liquidity provider, and price sensor that empowers decentralized exchange and the automated portfolio management of tokens on Ethereum. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native BAL token.

en.name: Balancer
en.description: Balancer is a community-driven protocol, automated portfolio manager, liquidity provider, and price sensor that empowers decentralized exchange and the automated portfolio management of tokens on Ethereum. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native BAL token.

fr.name: Balancer
fr.description: Balancer est un protocole communautaire, un gestionnaire de portefeuille automatisé, un fournisseur de liquidités et un agrégateur de prix qui permet l'échange décentralisé et la gestion automatisée du portefeuille de jetons sur Ethereum. Les utilisateurs peuvent participer à la gouvernance du protocole par le biais du jeton natif BAL.

es.name: Balancer
es.description: Balancer es un protocolo impulsado por la comunidad, un gestor de cartera automatizado, un proveedor de liquidez y un sensor de precios que permite el intercambio descentralizado y la gestión automatizada de cartera de tokens en Ethereum. Los usuarios pueden opinar sobre la gobernanza del protocolo con su token BAL nativo.

de.name: Balancer
de.description: Balancer ist ein Community-gesteuertes Protokoll, ein automatisierter Portfolio-Manager, ein Liquiditätsanbieter und ein Preissensor, der den dezentralen Austausch und das automatisierte Portfolio-Management von Token auf Ethereum ermöglicht. Die Benutzer können mit dem nativen BAL-Token ein Mitspracherecht bei der Protokollverwaltung haben.

pt.name: Balancer
pt.description: Balancer é um protocolo gerido pela comunidade, um gestor de portfólio automatizado, um provedor de liquidez, e sensor de preço que suporta exchanges descentralizadas e a gestão automatizada de portfólio no Ethereum. Usuários podem ter uma voz na governança do protocolo governance com seu token nativo BAL.

el.name: Balancer
el.description: Balancer is a community-driven protocol, automated portfolio manager, liquidity provider, and price sensor that empowers decentralized exchange and the automated portfolio management of tokens on Ethereum. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native BAL token.

tr.name: Balancer
tr.description: Balancer, Ethereum'da merkezi olmayan değişimi ve tokenlerin otomatik portföy yönetimini güçlendiren topluluk odaklı bir protokol, otomatik portföy yöneticisi, likidite sağlayıcısı ve fiyat sensörüdür. Kullanıcılar, yerel BAL belirteci ile protokol yönetiminde söz sahibi olabilir.

vi.name: Balancer
vi.description: Balancer is a community-driven protocol, automated portfolio manager, liquidity provider, and price sensor that empowers decentralized exchange and the automated portfolio management of tokens on Ethereum. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native BAL token.

zh.name: Balancer
zh.description: Balancer is a community-driven protocol, automated portfolio manager, liquidity provider, and price sensor that empowers decentralized exchange and the automated portfolio management of tokens on Ethereum. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native BAL token.

hi.name: Balancer
hi.description: Balancer एक समुदाय-संचालित प्रोटोकॉल, स्वचालित पोर्टफोलियो प्रबंधक, तरलता प्रदाता और मूल्य सेंसर है जो विकेन्द्रीकृत विनिमय और एथेरियम पर टोकन के स्वचालित पोर्टफोलियो प्रबंधन को सशक्त बनाता है। उपयोगकर्ता अपने मूल BAL टोकन के साथ प्रोटोकॉल शासन में अपनी बात रख सकते हैं।

ja.name: Balancer
ja.description: Balancerは自動ポートフォリオ管理、流動性プロバイダー、価格センサーの機能を持つコミュニティ主導のプロトコルであり、イーサリアム上の分散型取引所と自動ポートフォリオ管理を強化します。ユーザーはネイティブBALトークンを保有することでプロトコルのガバナンスに発言権を持つことができます。
